# HMCharacteristicWriteAction

**Class**

An action in an action set that writes a value to a characteristic.

## Declaration

```swift
class HMCharacteristicWriteAction<TargetValueType> where TargetValueType : NSCopying
```

## Overview

Action sets are instances of [doc://com.apple.homekit/documentation/HomeKit/HMActionSet].

## New Methods

- **init(characteristic:targetValue:)**: Initialize a characteristic write action with a specified characteristic and target value.
- **characteristic**: The characteristic whose value is to be written by the action.
- **targetValue**: The value that will be written to the characteristic when the action is executed.
- **updateTargetValue(_:completionHandler:)**: Updates the target value.

## Defining the associated actions

- **actions**: Set of actions in the action set.
- **addAction(_:completionHandler:)**: Adds an action to the action set.
- **removeAction(_:completionHandler:)**: Removes an action from the action set.
- **HMAction**: An abstract base class for actions in HomeKit.

## Inherits From

- HMAction

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
